---
title: get_round_number
description: Return the current round number.
---

## Signature

```py
def get_round_number() -> int
```

## Description

Returns the current round number of the simulation.
The round number starts at `1` and increments by `1` after each simulation turn.

## Example

```py
round_number = get_round_number()

if round_number == 5:
  print("Special action triggered")
```
